name: Giant Hive
description: A massive insect colony contains thousands of giant insects working together, with specialized chambers for different functions. The insect products and materials can be valuable, while the numerous insects and their coordinated attacks create overwhelming danger.
atmosphere: Air buzzes with wings sound and honey, wax, and insect musk scent. Thousands of giant insects move in coordinated patterns like living machine. Skin crawls with sense of countless chitinous bodies moving around you. Taste of fear and insect pheromones fills mouth. Weight of coordinated attacks and overwhelming numbers makes heart race with terror.
